description: The Okushimo Japanese Maple is an amazing tree that is sure to add beauty and interest to any garden. Its unique leaves are deep green with yellow tips, giving it a pop of color in any landscape. This deciduous tree is highly adaptable and can tolerate harsh weather conditions, making it easy to care for and a great addition to any outdoor area. Its showy red-purple flowers in the spring make it a truly remarkable sight. In the fall, its leaves turn a brilliant orange, bringing a splash of warmth to the season. Overall, the Okushimo Japanese Maple is an amazing tree that will add interest and beauty to any garden.
